Package: org.lenskit.specs

[Java] Interface SpecHandler

  • Resolve specifications into objects in an extensible fashion. The heart of this interface is the build(Class, AbstractSpec). Instances of this interface are loaded via the java.util.ServiceLoader facility, and queried in turn for one that can turn a particular specification into the requested type. Handlers should be selective in the types they handle, to minimize the chance of conflicts.

    See Also:
    SpecUtils.buildObject

    • Methods Summary

        Methods 
        Type Name and description
        T build(java.lang.Class<T> type, AbstractSpec spec)
        Build an object from a specification.

    • Method Detail

      • public T build(java.lang.Class<T> type, AbstractSpec spec)

        Build an object from a specification.

        Returns:
        The object, or null if this handler cannot build an object.
        Parameters:
        type - The type of object desired.
        spec - The specification.
        - The type of object.
